title: Ayaz Sadiq, Mustafa condole demise of Mudassar’s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 16 (APP):The Speaker of the National Assembly, Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, and Deputy Speaker, Syed Ghulam Mustafa Shah, on Friday, expressed deep grief over the passing of Mudassar Hussain Rajput’s mother.
In their separate condolence messages to Mudassar Hussain, both the Speaker and Deputy Speaker conveyed their heartfelt sympathies, stating that they share in the sorrow and pain that Mudassar and his family are enduring during this difficult time.
They prayed to the Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
